var DISTANCE=120;var TRANSITION_ENTER={duration:0.64,ease:[0.43,0.13,0.23,0.96]};var TRANSITION_EXIT={duration:0.48,ease:[0.43,0.13,0.23,0.96]};export var varFadeIn={initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeInUp={initial:{y:DISTANCE,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{y:DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeInLeft={initial:{x:-DISTANCE,opacity:0},animate:{x:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{x:-DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeInDown={initial:{y:-DISTANCE,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{y:-DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeInRight={initial:{x:DISTANCE,opacity:0},animate:{x:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{x:DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};
